sense.gloss: rippling (of a stream, etc.), murmuring, purling
quickly and easily (e.g. write a letter), with ease, smoothly, fluently
smooth and dry (hair, sand, etc.), silky, powdery (e.g. snow), free-flowing (e.g. blood)

sdata.j: ↑小川↑↓おがわ↓が|さらさら|と↑流↑↓なが↓れる↑音↑↓おと↓が↑聞↑↓き↓こえる。
sdata.e: We can hear a brook murmuring.

sdata.j: あの↑二人↑↓ふたり↓、↑元↑↓もと↓に↑戻↑↓もど↓すつもりなんて↑更々↑↓|さらさら|↓ないみたいだし・・・。
sdata.e: It seems they don't have the slightest intention of restoring it.

sdata.j: ↑普段↑↓ふだん↓あまり↑食↑↓た↓べないのに、お↑茶漬↑↓ちゃづ↓けを|さらさら|と↑食↑↓た↓べているコマーシャルを↑見↑↓み↓ると、↑無性↑↓むしょう↓に↑食↑↓た↓べたくなってしまう。
sdata.e: I don't usually eat it, but because I saw the commercial where the person was slurping down ochazuke, it made me really crave it.

sdata.j: ↑初↑↓はじ↓めはさ、↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑継↑↓つ↓ぐ↑気↑↓き↓は|さらさら|なかったんだ。
sdata.e: At first, I didn't intend to take over the family business.

sdata.j: ↑初↑↓はじ↓めはさ、↑家↑↓いえ↓の↑仕事↑↓しごと↓を↑継↑↓つ↓ぐ↑気↑↓き↓は|さらさら|なかったんだ。
sdata.e: At first, I had no intention of taking over the family business.
